Token.Abstract: This class handles communication with the Bridge authentication API, as well as maintaining authentication credentials obtained therefrom.

Return the default (shared) component of this type (SBBAuthManager), configured with the gSBBAppURLPrefix and the default environment. In debug builds, this is SBBEnvironmentStaging; in release builds, SBBEnvironmentProd. Also configures the component to use the SBBNetworkManager currently registered the first time this is called, or the default if none was registered yet.
Return an SBBAuthManager component configured for the specified environment, appURLPrefix, and baseURLPath with a default network manager.

Parameter.Name: environment
Parameter.Abstract: The SBBEnvironment to use (prod, staging, dev).

Parameter.Name: study
Parameter.Abstract: The app-specific study identifier to use (typically set in gSBBAppStudy).

Parameter.Name: baseURLPath
Parameter.Abstract: The URL path to prefix with the app server prefix and environment string (e.g. @"sagebridge.org")

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SBBAuthManager component configured for an environment, appURLPrefix, and baseURLPath.

Token.Abstract: Return an SBBAuthManager component configured for the specified baseURL with a default network manager.

Parameter.Name: baseURL
Parameter.Abstract: The baseURL to use.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SBBAuthManager component configured with a specific network manager.

Token.Abstract: Return an SBBAuthManager component configured with the specified network manager.

Parameter.Name: networkManager
Parameter.Abstract: The SBBNetworkManager to use.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SBBAuthManager component configured with a specific network manager.

Token.Abstract: Sign up for an account using a SignUp record, which is basically a StudyParticipant object with a password field. At minimum, the email and password fields must be filled in; in general, you would also want to fill in any of the following information available at sign-up time: firstName, lastName, sharingScope, externalId (if used), dataGroups, notifyByEmail, and any custom attributes you've defined for the attributes field.

Parameter.Name: signUp
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBSignUp object representing the participant signing up.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion. Optional.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Sign up for an account with an email address, userName, password, and an optional list of data group tags. An email will be sent to the specified email address containing a link to verify that this is indeed that person's email. The userName and password won't be valid for signing in until the email has been verified. (Deprecated: Use signUpStudyParticipant:withPassword:completion: instead.)

Parameter.Name: email
Parameter.Abstract: The email address to be associated with the account.

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username to use for the account.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The password to use for the account.

Parameter.Name: dataGroups
Parameter.Abstract: An array of dataGroup tags to assign to the user at signup. Optional.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion. Optional.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Sign up for an account with an email address, userName, and password. This is a convenience method that calls signUpWithEmail:username:password:dataGroups:completion: with dataGroups set to nil. (Deprecated: Use signUpStudyParticipant:withPassword:completion: instead.)

Parameter.Name: email
Parameter.Abstract: The email address to be associated with the account.

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username to use for the account.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The password to use for the account.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion. Optional.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Request Bridge to re-send the email verification link to the specified email address.

Parameter.Name: email
Parameter.Abstract: The email address for which to re-send the verification link.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: For backward compatibility only. Use signInWithEmail:password:completion instead (which this method now calls).
Sign in to an existing account with an email and password.

Parameter.Name: email
Parameter.Abstract: The email address of the account being signed into. This is used by Bridge as a unique identifier for a participant within a study.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The password of the account.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion. The responseObject will be an NSDictionary containing a Bridge API UserSessionInfo object in case you need to refer to it, but the SBBAuthManager handles the session token for all Bridge API access via this SDK, so you can generally ignore it if you prefer. You can convert the responseObject to an SBBUserSessionInfo object (or whatever you've mapped it to) in your completion handler by calling [SBBComponent(SBBObjectManager) objectFromBridgeJSON:responseObject] (or substituting another instance of idSBBObjectManagerProtocol if you've set one up).

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Sign out of the user's Bridge account.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Call this at app launch to ensure the user is logged in to their account (if any).

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

Token.Abstract: Request that the password be reset for the account associated with the given email address. An email will be sent to that address with instructions for choosing a new password.

Parameter.Name: email
Parameter.Abstract: The email address associated with the account whose password is to be reset.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Reset the password for this user's account.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The new password for this user's account.

Parameter.Name: token
Parameter.Abstract: The sptoken sent to the user's email address in response to a requestPasswordResetForEmail: call.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A SBBNetworkManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: This method is used by other API manager components to inject the session token header for authentication.

Parameter.Name: headers
Parameter.Abstract: A mutable dictionary containing HTTP header key-value (string) pairs, to which to add the auth header.
